title: Suit up for Snowdown with vault-clearing sales

replies.body: It will be nice if we are allowed to change the ward skins in champion selecting. Up if you agree!
And Summoner Icons!
um... you mean Runes right?

you can currently change runes in champ select, i am pretty sure they mean exactly what they said man. 

i think changing ward skin to suit champ is a great idea, i have ended up with 4 ward skins, and you can ONLY change them via shop. 

you also kinda feel like you could lose them, maybe even put them in summoner profile, with runes masteries and stats. but yeah, in champ select.

Uuuuum, no. you Can't change Runes in Champ Select.
You start the game with 2 Rune Pages, I'm really sorry to tell you this, but those 2 Rune Pages wont cover many Champ styles... then You can finally get 20 Rune Pages... but, THAT STILL WONT COVER ALL OVER THE CHAMPS!
It's the 16th where the bloody hell is Snowdown?
Well on the North American version of this page they used the same dates, so im guessing its their 16th our 17th. They really need use to Australia dates when posting on the oce site.
Oi its the 16th and where are the cute {{summoner:31}} and {{summoner:30}} ???????????? I want  my skins!!!!!!
I just want my winter wonder orianna!!!!! {{champion:61}} {{champion:61}}
{{champion:61}} its 16th but where is the skins???!!
yeah, it seems like few people even care, can't find any more info. anywhere. but but but... i care! SNOWDOWN!!
where is the poro rider {{champion:113}}  :(
ikr{{summoner:3}}

Hi Again,
I am currently looking into why the individual skins are not showing up for some players.
I'll give you an update shortly.
Hey, it's the 16th. What time can we expect the new skins? Or did the post mean USA 16th?
Yeah i was wondering what time this will be live for OCE because it is the 16th now and still no new skins or snowdown chests
^^ i have been saving the Rp for snowday {{champion:90}}  for a while and thought he will be out today

You can still purchase them if you go to the champion bio page where all the skins are listed.

http://i.gyazo.com/ee9016fc52424daedd2015858c7c2b3b.png
That's not working for me, Dark Candy Fiddlesticks is still afk.
yeah same dark candy fiddlesticks is afk for me to {{champion:9}}  {{item:3070}}
{{champion:11}} +{{item:3211}} ={{champion:24}}
{{champion:161}} Illuminati confirmed.
lol
isnt snowday malzahar and the new game mode meant to come out today?

i check lolnexus when i see rek sai the pic is akali also a few weeks ago i saw {{champion:64}}  was on sale i went to buy it was {{champion:63}}  i checked this web it was still {{champion:64}} on sale but when i try to buy it was brand so i didnt buy :(
What time during the 16th will it be available? Because it isn't right now.
Why aren't they out yet? {{summoner:30}}
omg i buy the poro ward instead i get the candy cane ward wow help me get poro.
true same happended :(
rework the nid skin for the cougar form because the dosent look good instead change it to a jingle bell necklace
Is there a reason there's no super bundle this time? Would of loved to just mass buy all bundes!
God you must have a disintegrating wallet to buy that xD{{summoner:3}} {{item:3096}}

Hi guys,
We are sorry for the issue with the bundle discount. I will be investigating why this has happened.

All discounts should now be working as intended.
Zed skin please riot, secret santa zed pls.
It's the 16th where the bloody hell is Snowdown? JESUS RIOT COME ON I WANT DAT WARD SKIN AND ICONZ, RIOT PLEASE!
cmon rito pls i want my winter wonder ori ;_; {{champion:61}}

i get that things do not always go to plan riot, but could we down here in OCE please get an update as to why Snowdown has not begun when indicated? i would really like to give you guys some money for Poro rider Sej, and a ward skin at the very least.
Guys were is the 16 of December sale or the release of skins  :({{summoner:14}}  i want my {{summoner:31}} ward and gamemade :D i got alot of rp to buy
how come i cant see any of the new sales? i cant see the poro wards, or the new skins, or the mystery gifts :S TAKE MY MONEEEEY
Why can't I find the{{summoner:31}} icon? D:
Riot, working hard for those Christmas bonuses

I have a question **Riot ToxicHawk** will you be able to buy all of the Poro icons in the store or will some of them be earned in game or by gifting your friends like the previous years please let me know so i can workout how much extra RP i will have to buy.
Pretty sure two of them you can earn since they don't change the look of your {{summoner:31}} in game.
Are we able to self mystery gift our selfs??? I would love it if I can send myself a 790 one.
please put zed on sale with shock blade {{champion:238}}

Every Snowdown bundle and individual skin is showing up for me EXCEPT Dark Candy Fiddlesticks, which is the ONLY skin I wanted to buy apart from Snow Day Malzahar when it comes on the 16th. Any reason why it's not appearing?
trying to do one of the new mystery gifts to a friend and it doent work :/
